ygData.subject: RE: Re: What to buy?
ygData.msgSnippet: I will probably keep my Cured Silk Ghi for quite a while, I think it is what makes a monk look like a monk. Shelza, 18th, Karana ...
ygData.messageBody:
I will probably keep my Cured Silk Ghi for quite a while, I think it is what
makes a monk look like a monk.

Shelza, 18th, Karana


>From: Guillaume Voizard <gvoizard@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
>To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
>Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Re: What to buy?
>Date: Fri, 4 Feb 2000 10:36:12 -0800
>
>Keep your cured silk gi !!!!!! Be a monk !!!!!!! I kept it til lvl 38, when
>I got my Robe. ;o)
>Well, look is very important for me, so that was my choice, and I was ok in
>fights. You do what you want, of course. Hehe...
>
>Tsin Suchiko
>40th rank, Tunare.
>
